00001 #ifndef __QSIM_H
00002 #define __QSIM_H
00003 /*****************************************************************************\
00004 * Qemu Simulation Framework (qsim)                                            *
00005 * Qsim is a modified version of the Qemu emulator (www.qemu.org), coupled     *
00006 * a C++ API, for the use of computer architecture researchers.                *
00007 *                                                                             *
00008 * This work is licensed under the terms of the GNU GPL, version 2. See the    *
00009 * COPYING file in the top-level directory.                                    *
00010 \*****************************************************************************/

00025   class Callback {
00026   public:
00027     virtual void inst(uint64_t vaddr, uint64_t paddr, 
00028                       uint8_t len, uint8_t inst[]) {}
00029     virtual void memOp(uint64_t vaddr, uint64_t paddr, 
00030                        uint8_t size, MemOpType type) {}
00031     virtual void magic(uint64_t rax) {}
00032   };
00033 
00034   class Params : public std::map<std::string, std::string> {
00035   public:
00036     Params() {}
00037     template <typename T> Params(std::string k, const T& v) {
00038       operator()(k, v);
00039     }
00040 
00041     template <typename T> Params & operator()(std::string k, const T& v) {
00042       std::stringstream ss;
00043       ss << v;
00044       Params &p = *this;
00045       p[k] = ss.str();
00046       return p;
00047     }
00048   };
00049 
00050   class Vm {
00051   public:
00052     Vm(Params &p);
00053     ~Vm();
00054     bool run(unsigned long cycles);
00055     void setIpc(double ipc);
00056 
00057     uint8_t memRead(uint64_t addr);
00058     void memWrite(uint64_t paddr, uint8_t data);
00059     uint64_t memSize();
00060 
00061     Callback *cb;
00062 
00063   private:
00064     int vmId;
00065     static int lastVmId;
00066 
00067     unsigned long clockFreq;
00068     double ipc;
00069     Time time;
00070     std::string vmPath;
00071     std::string hdPath;
00072     std::string biosPath;

00075     static Callback nullCallback;

00088   };

00090   struct VmQItem { public: virtual ~VmQItem() {} };
00091 
00092   struct VmQInst : public VmQItem {
00093     VmQInst(uint64_t vaddr, uint64_t paddr, uint8_t len, uint8_t data[]) :
00094       vaddr(vaddr), paddr(paddr), len(len) {
00095       inst = new uint8_t[len];
00096       std::copy(data, data+len, inst);
00097     }
00098 
00099     ~VmQInst() { delete inst; }
00100 
00101     uint64_t vaddr, paddr;
00102     uint8_t len;
00103     uint8_t *inst;
00104   };
00105 
00106   struct VmQMemOp : public VmQItem {
00107     VmQMemOp(uint64_t vaddr, uint64_t paddr, uint8_t size, MemOpType type) :
00108       vaddr(vaddr), paddr(paddr), size(size), type(type) {}
00109     uint64_t vaddr, paddr;
00110     uint8_t size;
00111     MemOpType type;
00112   };
00113 
00114   struct VmQMagic : public VmQItem {
00115     VmQMagic(uint64_t rax): rax(rax) {}
00116     uint64_t rax;
00117   };

00119   class VmQ {
00120   public:
00121     VmQ(Vm &v);
00122     ~VmQ();
00123 
00124     VmQItem *front() { return q.front(); }
00125     void push(VmQItem *i) { q.push(i); }
00126     void pop() { delete q.front(); q.pop(); }
00127     bool empty() { return q.empty(); }
00128       
00129   private:
00130     std::queue<VmQItem *> q;
